comment.note: French President's wife Brigitte Macron reacts during a dinner at the Elysee Palace in Paris on September 30 2021 as part of the closing ceremony of the Africa2020 season, which presented the views of the civil society from the African continent and its recent diaspora in different sectors of activity. - The Season 2020 focused on innovation in the arts, sciences, technology, entrepreneurship and the economy. (Photo by Ludovic MARIN / POOL / AFP) (Photo by LUDOVIC MARIN/POOL/AFP via Getty Images)
